verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> directly <S%G2112><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the morning <S%G4404><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> held <S%G4160><s%> a consultation <S%G4824><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> council <S%G4892><s%>, and bound <S%G1210><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and carried <S%G667><s%> him away <S%G667><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> him to Pilate <S%G4091><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> accused <S%G2723><s%> him <S%G846><s%> of many things <S%G4183><s%>: but he answered nothing.
